Class MotePacketParser

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--MotePacketParser
Direct Known Subclasses:
MotePacketSerialParser
public class MotePacketParser
extends java.lang.Object

A MotePacketParser accumulates bytes until a complete mote packet is received, then it sends the packet to its set of registered MotePacketListener's.
